casebody.data:
Frank J. SULLIVAN and Katharine B. Sullivan, His Wife, v. PHILADELPHIA SUBURBAN TRANSPORTATION COMPANY, Appellant. No. 8975. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Jan. 21, 1946. Decided Feb. 1, 1946. Thomas E. Comber, Jr., of Philadelphia, Pa. (Pepper, Bodine, Stokes & Schoch, of Philadelphia, Pa,, .on the brief), for appellant. Henry A. Frye, of Philadelphia, Pa. (Karl W. Johnson, of Upper Darby, Pa., on the brief), for appellees.

Before BIGGS, GOODRICH, and MCLAUGHLIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the court below is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Ganey, 64 F.Supp. 845.
